name: Retro Dash
description:
Control  : tilt Left- press  Left,  tilt Right- press Right, Dash - press Space or Mouseclick

DRIVE as fast you can possible can!

Collect all the diamonds to reach even harder difficulty!
Dodge to increase your flexibility and reflex!
Master your balls and you can clear any obstacle with no problem!

☺Colorful Neon game with HD graphics, more colorful than a rainbow!
☺Crazier pinball driving than any pinball game!
☺Challenge yourself and keep mastering!
☺Choose your alternative path and strive for success!
☺Clap your hands to the Synth-wave music blasting through your ears!

☺Celebrate the joy of dashing through colorful neon!
☺Difficulty depends only if you are a good driver!
☺Different kind of particle effects!

Enjoy the ride of the old times and combine with new times, where 80 synth-wave and neon was the coolest thing ever!

CyberPunkish Dash! Lets go!
